Title: Enacts the energy assessment cap and consumer cost relief act of 2024
Summary: Enacts the "energy assessment cap and consumer cost relief act" to limit certain surcharge increases; directs studies on costs associated with environmental and energy laws; directs a study on the value of assets and utility gas infrastructure discontinued as a result of laws and regulatory actions; institutes a moratorium on related surcharges, taxes, fees and cost bearing regulations for five years.
LawCode: Add ยง18, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to limits on surcharge increases; directing a study of the costs associated with recent environmental and energy related laws and the value of stranded utility assets resulting in discontinuance and/or abandonment of utility gas infrastructure; and imposing a moratorium on new energy taxes, fees and regulations
